traits.Amphibious: The turtle can breathe air and water.
traits.Stable: Whenever an effect knocks the turtle prone, it can make a DC 10+1d4 + 8 Constitution saving throw to avoid being knocked prone. A prone turtle is upside down. To stand up, it must succeed on a DC 10+1d4 + 8 Dexterity check on its turn and then use all its movement for that turn.

actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) slashing damage.
